title: Broken......
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: Unfortunately, this was purchased for my elderly mother and the speaker phone did not work. Nor will the battery charge, she can only use it while plugged in. I’m in the process of attempting an exchange.
author: Jennifer Schofield
Split_3: I’m in the process of attempting an exchange.
